original_text: Then a breach was made in the city, and all the men of war fled by night by the way of the gate between the two walls, by the king's garden, and the Chaldeans were around the city. And they went in the direction of the Arabah.
korean_text: 그 성벽이 파괴되매 모든 군사가 밤중에 두 성벽 사이 왕의 동산 곁문 길로 도망하여 갈대아인들이 그 성읍을 에워쌌으므로 그가 아라바 길로 가더니

sentences.original_text: Then a breach was made in the city
and all the men of war fled by night
by the way of the gate between the two walls
and the Chaldeans were around the city
And they went in the direction of the Arabah
